author: Football Italia staff
title: Sampdoria all-clear from COVID-19
description: Sampdoria have announced that all the players who had previously tested positive are now free of COVID-19.  	The Serie A club was unusual in that it refused to confirm how many of its players and members of staff had contracted the virus.
content:
Sampdoria have announced that all the players who had previously tested positive are now free of COVID-19.
The Serie A club was unusual in that it refused to confirm how many of its players and members of staff had contracted the virus.
